poem:
"From Zero to the Sun"

Decadent dream of the damned,
Lost in a land unfamiliar, strife reborn.
The dance of defeat, a grim lullaby,
Etched in the steel heart of Samoan skies.
Oh, wayward children of the world sphere,
In the face of laughter and derision,
Under the cloak of a foreigner - bitter, fiery,
Salvage the crucible of honour, 
Build it higher. Unfettered, shine.
